mnd1:3.5: pāvuraṇā → pāpuraṇā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | gavā → gāvo (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
mnd1:6.4: na hehisī”ti → na hehisi (sya1ed, sya2ed); na hohisīti (pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
mnd1:10.3: jāgu → jagu (si, mr); jātu (sya-all); jagū (pts-vp-pli1) | indagu → indagū (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd1:17.3: Atha antena jahati → atho antena jahati (sya-all); asahantena dahati (mr)
mnd1:27.8: supatīti → sappatīti (mr) | sarīsapo → siriṁsapo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sirisapo (sya-all)
mnd1:28.4: paligedho → paḷigedho (bj) | āyūhinī → āyūhanī (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd1:48.5: mahiṁsā → gomahisā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ahī vicchikā → ahi vicchikā (sya-all); ahivicchikā (pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
mnd1:81.4: Neva saṁsibbati → neva sineti (bj); neva visīneti (sya-all); neva visineti (pts-vp-pli1)
mnd1:81.31: bhavapariyante ṭhito → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
mnd1:81.32: saṁsārapariyante ṭhito → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
mnd1:81.33: vaṭṭapariyante ṭhito → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
mnd1:81.34: antime bhave ṭhito → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
